Articles.Content:
Over the past few days posts have been made, threads have been created, and lots of speculation has occurred. Through out all this many members have been throwing accusations around, with circumstantial evidence at best. Please remember that this wonderful game exists because of their hard work and dedication. Please remember that the new developers are now probably worried about this hostile seeming community. and most importantly remember that everyone involved is human with normal feelings hopes and dreams, and all of this must be awful for them. 

 

Best of luck to all squad staff who have left, who remain and to all who are joining. 

 

I'm going to request this thread locked, I don't want a discussion, I would like people to sit back and think that behind the usernames, profile pictures, keyboards and screen sits a person the same as you.

I do not think the community is hostile to the devs. We actually love 'em.

It is on the company they work for to protect them during hard times, if they do really need to be protected. 

I would suggest a statement.

Thread closed as per Kertech's request

12 minutes ago, Kertech said:

I'm going to request this thread locked, I don't want a discussion, I would like people to sit back and think that behind the usernames, profile pictures, keyboards and screen sits a person the same as you.
